name: Concentré Vitamine C
try_our: sérum concentré à base de vitamine C antioxydante, qui améliore l'éclat et la clarté globale de la peau.
description: This concentrated serum, containing pure 10% Vitamin C antioxidant, is packaged in protective single-dose capsules to enhance product freshness. This powerful antioxidant is an effective daily treatment to protect against drying environmental stressors.

name: Mousse Glycolique Nettoyante
try_our: NOUVELLE mousse nettoyante ultra-concentrée en acide glycolique, formulée pour exfolier et purifier les pores obstrués.
description: This high-strength foaming cleanser is formulated with an amphoteric system designed to deliver the benefits of Glycolic Acid and Bionic Acid while minimizing the potential for skin irritation. Formulated to lightly exfoliate and cleanse clogged pores to prepare the skin for optimal benefits of the regimen that follows.
ingredients: MÉLANGE AHA/PHA (ACIDE GLYCOLIQUE (AHA) 12 % ET ACIDE LACTOBIONIQUE (PHA))

name: Soin de Microdermabrasion à l’acide glycolique
try_our: NOUVEAU soin exfoliant en une seule étape: formulé à base d'acide glycolique (10%) et de cristaux d'alumine de qualité professionnelle pour revitaliser immédiatement la peau, il offre une action resurfaçante instantanée et une apparence plus lisse et plus éclatante.
description: This one-step exfoliating polish provides instant skin resurfacing with 10% Glycolic Acid combined with professional grade alumina crystals. The dual physical and chemical action rapidly removes skin’s surface cells to help clarify and clear impurities from pores.
ingredients: ACIDE GLYCOLIQUE (AHA) 10 % COMBINÉ À DES CRISTAUX DE QUALITÉ PROFESSIONNELLE

name: Sérum de Nuit Intégral avec 0, 3% de Rétinol
try_our: NOUVEAU soin régénérant puissant à base de rétinol pur pour cibler un aspect global de la peau visiblement plus ferme.
description: This potent serum delivers 0.3% pure, stabilized Retinol along with NEOGLUCOSAMINE™ and Hyaluronic Acid to synergistically intensify skin’s hydrating matrix for a firmer look.

name: Contour des Yeux Intégral au rétinol
try_our: NOUVEAU soin yeux fermeté puissant à base de rétinol pur pour cibler un contour des yeux visiblement plus ferme.
description: This potent eye cream is formulated with pure Retinol in a firming complex to help encourage skin renewal for a brighter, firmer and smoother undereye appearance.

name: Sérum Glycolique Régénérateur
try_our: NOUVEAU soin lissant antioxydant à base de 10 % d'acide glycolique (AHA) pour affiner l'apparence du grain de peau, cibler un teint plus lisse et éclatant, et améliorer la qualité globale de la peau.
description: This powerful combination of 10% Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) and antioxidants is formulated to renew the appearance of skin’s surface texture. Glycolic Acid is precisely blended to maximize exfoliation of surface skin cells, while maintaining an optimal pH.

before.name: SÉRUM GLYCOLIQUE RÉGÉNÉRATEUR SOIN LISSANT ANTIOXYDANT

try_our: NOUVELLE crème de nuit hydratante à l'acide glycolique (AHA), qui agit la nuit pour exfolier les cellules de surface et cibler le combleur naturel hydratant de la peau pour la laisser lisse et éclatante.
description:
Intensive radiance boosting moisturizing cream
    Works overnight to renew skin

description: This daily moisturizing cream is specially formulated to provide hydration and visible skin plumping benefits. Hyaluronic acid and an antiaging peptide complex are blended together to target the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

try_our: NOUVELLE peeling double action puissant qui offre l'effet lissant d'un peeling chimique grâce à un complexe ultra-concentré d'acide glycolique et d'acide poly-hydroxylé pour cibler un teint plus clair.
description: This potent dual-action peel combines the skin smoothing action of a chemical peel utilizing a highly concentrated complex of 10% Glycolic Acid and 10% Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) with a scientifically proven brightening peptide to target maximum radiance results.

name: Peeling Anti-âge Duo d’Acides
try_our: NOUVELLE peeling double action puissant qui allie l'effet lissant d'un peeling chimique à un agent volumateur pour cibler la matrice d'hydratation naturelle de la peau, et réduire l'apparence des rides et des ridules.
description: This potent dual-action face peel combines the smoothing action of a chemical peel with a volumizing agent to target the skin's natural hydrating matrix and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

name: Peeling Clarifiant Duo d’Acides
try_our: NOUVEAU peeling double action puissant qui allie l'effet lissant d'un peeling chimique à un agent volumateur pour cibler la matrice d'hydratation naturelle de la peau, et réduire l'apparence des rides et des ridules.
description: This potent dual-action Antiaging peel features the skin smoothing action of a chemical peel utilizing an exfoliating complex of 10% Glycolic Acid and 10% Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) to target maximum clarifying results.

try_our: NOUVELLE crème de jour haute puissance, formulée avec l'acide glycolique et un peptide raffermissant pour cibler la matrice d'hydratation de la peau et ainsi minimiser l'apparence des rides et des ridules.
description: This powerful daily anti-wrinkle and fine lines cream is formulated with 8% glycolic acid and a firming peptide to target skin's hydrating matrix to minimize the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

name: Contour des Yeux Illuminateur

description: This powerful cream blends together antioxidants, peptides, and algae extracts to target visible dark circles under the eyes. An anti-aging blend of Gluconolactone plus Bionic Acid targets skin’s natural hydrating matrix to cushion and brighten the appearance of dark, under eye skin.

name: Crème Glycolique Lissante

description: This 10% Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) moisturizer combines Glycolic and Citric Acids to reduce signs of aging. Glycolic Acid is scientifically proven to target skin’s natural filler, plumping and volumizing the appearance of skin, so that wrinkles appear smoother. Specially formulated to provide a potent and precise delivery of Glycolic Acid while maintaining an optimal pH of this high-strength formulation.

description:
This 10% Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) lotion combines Glycolic and Citric Acids for powerful antiaging action. Glycolic Acid is scientifically proven to target skin’s natural filler, plumping and volumizing the appearance of skin, so that wrinkles appear smoother. 

Specially formulated to provide a potent and precise delivery of Glycolic Acid while maintaining an optimal pH of this high-strength formulation.

name: Crème Visage Ultra-Hydratante

description: A gentle, high-strength, antiaging face cream with 10% Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) to lightly exfoliate, moisturize and reduce visible signs of aging. Contains PHA, known to soothe and strengthen the protective moisture barrier for dry or stressed skin.

An 8% exfoliating blend containing Mandelic Acid and Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) helps clarify skin and improves the appearance of oily skin.

This multi-action serum targets skin discoloration and uneven skin tone. Contains NEOGLUCOSAMINE™, a gentle exfoliator known to help fade the appearance of existing skin discolorations. This formula includes 4% Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), and a blend of
Vitamin C, B-Resorcinol and Licorice Extract to help promote a brighter and more even skin tone.
